text: Lɨdɨŋ 6.7 Lu 10.1 nudɨ kulaŋ human limu limu sɨkuala hɨcɨ limu akica cɨjɨŋ haman agɨladɨ abɨci nudɨ micɨ vehavɨmalɨ. Vehavɨci nulɨdɨ abamalɨ. Namɨlaŋ akica akica lɨdɨŋ mu hɨvɨ mu hɨvɨ ukalaŋ uamalɨ. Haman aba nulɨsaŋ sudɨ sɨbɨlɨ agɨlaŋ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ hɨvɨ hɨnevɨdaci lakulaku agasaŋ ibi igumalɨ.
